element-citation.article-title: Tunnel luminescence: failure of the Born-Oppenheimer and Franck-Condon approximations and collective phenomena
element-citation.comment: [Proc. Int. Conf. Lumin. Opt. Spectr. Cond. Matter – ICL ’96, Prague, Czech Republic, 18–23 August 1996 (Elsevier, Amsterdam, 1996)]
